issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
In dashboard click Download IOS & Xcode
or click Download Android



h3. Actual Result
Loading bar is stuck, let sit over night, got error.  

h3. Expected Result
Having SDK's downloaded, and updates updated.  I did take off my firewalls although this wasn't a desired action.  This did get rid of the blocked part, however the result is the same.

comments.body: Hello [~averybirchard@yahoo.com], Did you try manually configuring SDK in your studio? Download [Android SDK| http://dl.google.com/android/android-sdk_r21.1-macosx.zip]. And go to your "studio/preference/ platform/android" and configure your Android SDK manually. Also you need to manually configure your iOS SDK from "studio/preference/ platform/iOS" and configure your xcode there. Thanks.
